SacredText.Author: Isaiah
SacredText.Days: Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah

SacredText.Author: Jeremiah
SacredText.Place: Anathoth in the land of Benjamin
SacredText.Days: Josiah the son of Amon king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign. Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah king of Judah, unto the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
